Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: My experience has all been in the US so it might not be pertinent - here, if they have reason to classify you as a “danger to self” they can place you on an involuntary 72 hour hold (exact details vary by state but that hold can often be extended with the ok of a judge). If you’ve been classified as a danger to yourself, the standard procedure on medical-surgical units seems to be to assign a 1:1 (a watcher). There might be some wiggle room in the policy though (if that policy even applies in your area). Good luck. I hope you can find a way forward and be safe <3
